title: The NHL Season Is Here!
description:
Welcome back to another episode of In The Crease! Linda and Emily are joined by ESPN's Kevin Weekes to preview opening night and give fans everything they need to know heading into this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda Cohn and Emily Kaplan preview ESPN's back to back coverage of opening night games!
